Name: Anima Forest
About the game: Features a day and night cycle, various survival mechanics, controls somewhat like top down MOBA / ARPG with freely turn-able camera. Learn unique class based abilities, grow more powerful through skill trees, level up your anima and equipment. Craft various items, consumables, and defend yourself from bosses and hostile monsters at night. Playing the tutorial at least once is recommended!
Meta Title: Anima Forest: Jul 21, 2021, Broot and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Anima Forest? Check out the release date (Jul 21, 2021), developer insights from Broot, and a complete game summary.
